source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Zu is half-starved and can't be arsed to do much about it.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_00<tab>Im Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens hat der Kobold Bo Zu eine Aufgabe für dich. Er sieht ganz schön ausgehungert aus.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_01<tab>After much racking of his hunger<var 1F /var>addled brain, Bo Zu has hit upon a plan to procure sustenance with minimal<var 1F /var>to<var 1F /var>no effort on his own part. To wit: you will bring ore to Camp Overlook under the pretense that you confiscated it from the kobolds' stock, requesting spare rations as reward for your efforts. As the dustman himself has no intention of parting with his own meager mining haul, travel to Iron Lake and acquire the necessary ore in his stead.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_01<tab>Bo Zu hat dich gebeten, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E895F030502 /var> zu sammeln. Drei sollten genügen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_02<tab>You have managed to acquire only a few chunks of the shabbiest-looking ore you have ever seen. Bring them to Camp Overlook, hoping that the quartermaster will pity you enough to offer some scant reward.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast genügend <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E895F030502 /var> gesammelt. Tausche sie bei der Versorgungssoldatin in Camp Ausblick gegen Essen für die Kobolde.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_03<tab>Rightfully unimpressed with your donation, the quartermaster tosses some leftovers from last night's supper your way with a strongly worded suggestion that you bother her no further. Take your sorry haul back to Bo Zu at the 789th Order Dig.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E895F030502 /var> gegen <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8960020502 /var> eingetauscht. Mehr wollte dir die Versorgungssoldatin für die minderwertige Ware nicht geben. Bring die spärliche Ausbeute zu Bo Zu ins Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_04<tab>Bo Zu is overjoyed at your efforts─the unappetizing nature of the meal outweighed by the fact that it was acquired without him lifting so much as a single paw. You cannot shake the feeling that the work<var 1F /var>shy kobold will not hesitate to employ similar tactics in the near future...
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_SEQ_04<tab>Bo Zu hat sich wahnsinnig über <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8960020502 /var> gefreut. Er scheint den Wert und die Qualität der Nahrung völlig falsch einzuschätzen, doch offensichtlich sind sie viel Schlechteres gewohnt.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_TODO_00<tab>Collect worthless ore around Iron Lake.
TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_TODO_01<tab>Deliver worthless ore to the quartermaster at Camp Overlook.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_TODO_01<tab><var 2B ((<var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E895F030502 /var>)) /var> zur Versorgungssoldatin in Camp Ausblick bringen

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the rotting vegetables to Bo Zu.

TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_000<tab>Zo Ga is true to his word. He has halved─yes, yes, cut in two─the 789th's ration allotment as punishment for our low yield. I am starving─ravenous, famished, starving! What, oh what, is a hungry kobold to do?
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_000<tab><knurr> ... Oh, mein Magen ... so leer. Hunger, Hunger! Ohne Essen ich keinen Schritt mehr mach.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_001<tab>Work harder, you say? But that sounds so tiring─grueling, taxing, tiring. I have a better plan. Yes, yes, a better plan, I have. Scraps of ore near Iron Lake, I saw. I was too tired to pick them up, but not you. No, no, not you.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_001<tab>Aber eine Idee ich hab! Gute Idee! Die Versorgungssoldatin in Camp Ausblick ganz viel Essen hat. Gutes Essen, leckeres Essen!

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_002<tab>You should gather them and take them to Camp Overlook, yes, yes. Tell the officer there you stole them from the naughty, naughty kobolds. As reward, you'll get tasty food, which you can bring to Bo Zu. Then we'll <var 1A 02 /var>feast<var 1A 01 /var>─gobble, gorge, feast!
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_002<tab>Kannst du sammeln <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E895F030502 /var> und bei ihr tauschen gegen schmackhafte Nahrung? <var 2B ((<var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E895F030502 /var>)) /var> von Kobolden geklaut, du ihr sagen, dann sicher erkenntlich sie sich wird zeigen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_003<tab>No food yet? Do hurry─my belly is rumbling─grumbling, mumbling, rumbling. You bring ore to Camp Overlook, then bring back food in return. You will do this for Bo Zu, yes? Yes, yes, you will.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_003<tab>Versorgungssoldatin in Camp Ausblick du bringen <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E895F030502 /var>. Von Kobolden geklaut du ihr sagen, dann sie wird dir geben leckeres Essen! Bitte, bitte, bring uns Essen! <knurr>

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_100_010<tab>What's that? Plundered some precious metals from the kobolds that ye'd donate to our cause?
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_100_010<tab>Du hast Eisenerz von den Kobolden erobert? Zeig mal her!

source:
TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_010<tab>Aye, the Maelstrom is fortunate indeed to 'ave capable allies like─
...Byregot's buttocks! These must be the sorriest dregs of ore I've ever 'ad the misfortune of layin' me eyes on.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_010<tab>... Nicht schlecht! ... Obwohl, halt mal! Das sind doch <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E895F030202 /var>! Willst du mich etwa übers Ohr hauen?

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_011<tab>Yer <var 1A 02 /var>reward<var 1A 01 /var>!? How about this: I'll give ye some leftover scraps from last night's dinner, and you'll promise to go away and not waste any more of me time. Deal?
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_011<tab>Dafür kann ich dir nicht viel geben. Hm ... mal sehen ... hier, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8960020202 /var>. Mehr ist nicht drin.

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_012<tab>Beggin' for slop doesn't become ye, friend. If this adventurin' thing doesn't work out for ye, the Maelstrom is always lookin' for a few good <var 08 E905 ((women)) ((men)) /var>. It's a hard life, but at least ye always know where yer next meal is comin' from.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_KOKKADAN01_000_012<tab>Was hast du damit eigentlich vor? Du willst es hoffentlich nicht selbst essen. Das macht dein Magen nicht mit, glaub mir!

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_020<tab>You have brought my meal!? Yes, yes, tell me you have! Bo Zu's belly rumbles, rumbles so loud that it almost caused a cave-in─a collapse, a rockfall, a cave-in!
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_020<tab>Ohohoho! Da du bist! Essen du hast mitgebracht, ja? Köstliches, leckeres Essen!

source: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_021<tab>Oh, this will be a meal to savor─relish, delight, savor! Yes, yes, it is as Gi Gu always says─no treat is tastier than that earned by the efforts of others.
target: TEXT_BANKOB101_01325_BOZU_000_021<tab>Oh, feines Essen, gutes Essen! Mit so einer Köstlichkeit ich nicht gerechnet hatte. Danke, danke! Ganz warm ums Herz mir wird! Warum so angewidert du guckst?
